title: Perfect Lover - 2001 [NL subs] comedy sci fi
description:
Perfect Lover (2001 - USA, Argentina)              aka The Woman Every Man Wants

Comedy / Science Fiction
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0220864/


6 Award WINS and 1 Award NOMINATION

It's the year 2025, and woman are now in political and economic control of the world, with men reduced to menial labor or clerical work. Guy works in plastic fabrication. His career is not going well and he has just been dumped by his girlfriend. Since sad and lonely guys are a dime a dozen, several firms manufacture humanoid robots that can be programmed to obey any instructions, and Guy decides a robot might work out better for him than a human being.


Video: XviD, 704x368, 25.000 fps, 2012 Kbps, 01h33m47s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 160 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional Dutch subtitles
